description: Introducing the 7th edition of Mammut's classic technical softshell – optimized through the feedback of outdoor enthusiasts like you. Made for year-round hiking, trekking and mountaineering, this versatile style uses 3-layer GORE-TEX Infinium to provide windproof breathability and a pleasant touch of stretch. With a water-repellent coating and a host of practical features, you’ll benefit from its two-way front zipper, adjustable hem and hood, pit zips, and three zippered pockets to stash your essentials. Comfortable, reliable, and ready for action, this tried-and-true jacket really is the Ultimate solution.
name: Mammut Ultimate VII SO Jacket - Mens
